name: smartlitefetch
description: A powerful HTTP request library with advanced features: caching, mocking, debugging, middleware, and support for both node-fetch 2.x and 3.x

scripts.test: npm run test:v2 && npm run test:v3 && npm run test:examples
scripts.test:examples: node examples/cache-example.js && node examples/middleware-example.js && node examples/mock-test-example.js && node examples/v2-example.js && node examples/v3-example.js && node examples/graphql-example.js && node examples/failover-example.js
scripts.prepublishOnly: npm run lint && npm run type-check && npm test
scripts.deploy:github: npm run lint && npm run type-check && git add . && (git diff --staged --quiet || git commit -m "Update project") && git pull --rebase origin master && git push origin master
scripts.deploy:npm:patch: npm run lint && npm run type-check && npm version patch && npm publish
scripts.deploy:npm:minor: npm run lint && npm run type-check && npm version minor && npm publish
scripts.deploy:npm:major: npm run lint && npm run type-check && npm version major && npm publish
scripts.build: echo Building project... && if not exist dist mkdir dist && cpy src/**/* dist --parents
scripts.build:full: npm run build:clean && npm run build && npm run build:types
scripts.clean: npm run build:clean && if exist node_modules\.cache rmdir /s /q node_modules\.cache

author: alvisliu
